hero.title: Hello, I'm Tiago. A Web Developer.
hero.subtitle: Passionate about creating modern and efficient web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a passionate web developer with a solid experience in creating websites and applications. I enjoy turning complex ideas into simple and intuitive user interfaces.
about.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, and learning new things.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.goat_desc: GOAT is a knowledge sharing platform via Google Meet. Choose a topic, select a GOAT's announcement and choose a time slot. Enjoy the course and create your own ad to share your knowledge.
projects.the_plant_spot_desc: A site where you can find the perfect plant for your home using filters like brightness, watering, etc...
projects.dysway_desc: A site that helps people learn about dyslexia and presents a list of dyslexic celebrities.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.paragraph: Have a project in mind or just want to chat? Feel free to contact me.

index.title: Tiago Gonçalves De Almeida - Web Developer
index.description: Portfolio of Tiago GONÇALVES DE ALMEIDA, a web developer specializing in React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Discover my projects and skills.

main.root_element_not_found: #root element not found in the DOM.
